General.Name: Chengdu Tianjian Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Chengdu Tianjian Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sales of solid-state microwave front ends in China. It offers missile-borne solid-state transmitters for use in the radar guidance system of missiles; phased array antennas for use in commercial satellites, and military weapons and equipment; and other solid-state transmitter products. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Chengdu, China.
General.Address: Science and Technology Incubation Park, Chengdu, China, 610041
